company_name: Moshe Tabo - Long-term Care Insurance Attorney
vision_summary: Attorney Moshe Tabo specializes in LTC insurance claims with 15+ years of experience, offering hands-on guidance and representation to maximize policyholder rights when insurers deny or underpay benefits. The mission is to provide expert, personal representation for policyholders in long-term care insurance claims against all major insurers in Israel.

products_services.description: One-on-one consultation to review policy terms, eligibility, claim steps, and documentation expectations.
